article.title: McMaster Promoted, To Command Fort Benning
article.author: Beverly Schaeffer

tags.tag: U.S. Army Maneuver Center of Excellence

article.text: Brig. Gen. Herbert R. McMaster Jr., USA, has been nominated for promotion to the rank of major general and assignment as commander, U.S. Army Maneuver Center of Excellence and Fort Benning, Georgia.
